o Implants, intrauterine devices and surgery should be delayed if:
 infection is present or suspected.
• Delay until such infection is cleared
 severe anaemia (Hb <7g/dL).
• Delay until anaemia has improved (urgent transfusion may be necessary)
• Screen for other health problems
